name: Accumbens Nucleus DBS-45
desc: When an ally target deals fatal damage to any enemy target, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 50%.
enhanced_desc: When an ally target deals fatal damage to any enemy target, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 50%. Every time "Brain in a Vat" is fully Charged, SPD increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).
